ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to Prof. Shu-ru Lin and Ning Jiang of the Laboratory of Molecular Biology, School of Basic Medical Science, Liaoning University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, for her technical advice and kind help in this work. This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (no. 81803727), Key Projects of Liaoning Natural Science Foundation Program (no. 20180540125), Guidance Plan of Liaoning Natural Science Foundation (no. 20180550188), and Project of Liaoning Provincial Department of Education (no. L201906, L202017). The funders provided financial support for the conduct of the research.
